name: 3D Pinball Hentai
description:
Introduction:3D Pinball hentai is very simplistic pinball game with Hentai and nude theme. Game first version contains 6 levels, which contains different hentai anime themed backgrounds and also some levels contain nude objects which give player score. Player can use 3 balls as in normal pinball game. Also player can get bonus ball by hitting different objects. levels contains also 3-4 flippers and some levels has some rampsFeatures:- Hentai themed levels
- Few nude game objects
- 6 levels
- Only basic settings

Warning: Game contains adult content!
